datasets.name: inventory_items_dataset
queryLines:
SELECT
  i.id,
  i.item_name,
  i.description,
  c.category_name,
  w.warehouse_name,
  s.supplier_name,
  i.quantity,
  i.unit_price,
  i.location,
  i.minimum_stock,
  i.date_added,
  i.last_updated,
  i.category_id,
  i.warehouse_id,
  i.supplier_id,
  w.latitude,
  w.longitude,
  w.city,
  w.state,
  w.country,
  s.latitude AS supplier_lat,
  s.longitude AS supplier_long,
  s.city AS supplier_city,
  s.state AS supplier_state,
  s.country AS supplier_country,
  (i.quantity * i.unit_price) AS total_value,
  CASE
    WHEN i.quantity <= i.minimum_stock THEN 'CRITICAL'
    WHEN i.quantity <= i.minimum_stock * 1.5 THEN 'LOW'
    ELSE 'OK'
  END AS stock_status
FROM reynoldspravindev_inventory_live.inventory_app.inventory_items i
LEFT JOIN reynoldspravindev_inventory_live.inventory_app.inventory_category c
  ON i.category_id = c.category_id
LEFT JOIN reynoldspravindev_inventory_live.inventory_app.inventory_warehouse w
  ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id
LEFT JOIN reynoldspravindev_inventory_live.inventory_app.inventory_supplier s
  ON i.supplier_id = s.supplier_id

datasets.name: categories_dataset
queryLines:
SELECT category_id, category_name, description, date_created, last_updated
FROM reynoldspravindev_inventory_live.inventory_app.inventory_category
ORDER BY category_name

datasets.name: warehouses_dataset
queryLines:
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name, address, city, state, country, county, zipcode,
       latitude, longitude, contact_person, phone, email, date_created, last_updated
FROM reynoldspravindev_inventory_live.inventory_app.inventory_warehouse
ORDER BY warehouse_name

datasets.name: suppliers_dataset
queryLines:
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_person, email, phone, address, city, state, country, county, zipcode,
       latitude, longitude, website, tax_id, payment_terms, date_created, last_updated
FROM reynoldspravindev_inventory_live.inventory_app.inventory_supplier
ORDER BY supplier_name

datasets.name: demand_forecast_dataset
queryLines:
SELECT df.forecast_date, ii.warehouse_id, ii.category_id, sum(df.forecasted_items) as forecasted_items, round(sum(ii.quantity)/30) as actual_items
FROM reynoldspravindev_demo.inventory_analytics.inventory_demand_forecast df
RIGHT JOIN reynoldspravindev_inventory_live.inventory_app.inventory_items ii
ON df.category_id = ii.category_id
AND df.warehouse_id = ii.warehouse_id
WHERE df.forecast_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 30 DAYS
GROUP BY ALL
ORDER BY df.forecast_date DESC

datasets.name: low_stock_dataset
queryLines:
SELECT 
  i.id, 
  i.item_name, 
  c.category_name, 
  w.warehouse_name, 
  s.supplier_name, 
  i.quantity, 
  i.minimum_stock, 
  i.unit_price, 
  (i.quantity * i.unit_price) AS total_value, 
  CASE 
    WHEN i.quantity <= i.minimum_stock THEN 'CRITICAL' 
    WHEN i.quantity <= i.minimum_stock * 1.5 THEN 'LOW' 
    ELSE 'OK' 
  END AS stock_status
FROM reynoldspravindev_inventory_live.inventory_app.inventory_items i
LEFT JOIN reynoldspravindev_inventory_live.inventory_app.inventory_category c 
  ON i.category_id = c.category_id
LEFT JOIN reynoldspravindev_inventory_live.inventory_app.inventory_warehouse w 
  ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id
LEFT JOIN reynoldspravindev_inventory_live.inventory_app.inventory_supplier s 
  ON i.supplier_id = s.supplier_id
-- WHERE i.quantity <= i.minimum_stock * 1.5
ORDER BY i.quantity ASC

datasets.name: category_value_dataset
queryLines:
SELECT 
  c.category_name, 
  SUM(i.quantity * i.unit_price) AS total_value, 
  COUNT(i.id) AS item_count
FROM reynoldspravindev_inventory_live.inventory_app.inventory_items i
LEFT JOIN reynoldspravindev_inventory_live.inventory_app.inventory_category c 
  ON i.category_id = c.category_id
GROUP BY c.category_name
ORDER BY total_value DESC

frame.title: Total Inventory Value
frame.description: Current total value of all inventory items ($)

frame.title: Warehouse Locations & Inventory Value
frame.description: Geographic distribution of warehouses sized by inventory value

frame.title: Supplier Locations & Value
frame.description: Geographic distribution of suppliers sized by business value

frame.title: Inventory Value Trend by Category
frame.description: Monthly trend of inventory value additions by category
